entry.string: Thank you for installing and trying Xaraya!
entry.translation: Obrigado por instalar e experimentar o Xaraya!

entry.string: Xaraya has reached Production Stable Version #(1)
entry.translation: Xaraya se encontra na Versão Estável de Produção #(1)

entry.string: This means we feel our functionality is complete, our core features are mature and the use of the modules in our distribution is stable enough to move to Xaraya 1.0 and beyond!
We still need you to keep filing any unexpected functionality in our bug tracker.
Thank you for your support, and feel free to join our development or user discussions to become involved in our community.
entry.translation: Obrigado pelo seu apoio. E sinta-se à vontade para unir-se a nossa equipe de desenvolvimento, ou grupo de usuários para participar da nossa comunidade.

entry.string: For more information on Xaraya, please visit Xaraya's website.
entry.translation: Para maiores informações sobre o Xaraya, por favor visite o site do Xaraya.
